module.name: Voicemail
module.changelog: *2.8.0.0* #4310 *2.7.0.1* #4210 *2.7.0.0* localizations *2.6.0.2* #3867 *2.6.0.1* #3780 *2.6.0.0* #1957, localizations, misc *2.5.1.7* #3698 *2.5.1.6* localization updates *2.5.1.5* #3399 and language updates *2.5.1.4* localization string enclosures *2.5.1.3* localization fixes *2.5.1.2* #3191 unitialized var, localization *2.5.1.1* #3152 uninitialized variable bug *2.5.1* #3099 allows a return to IVR from voicemail option *2.5.0.2* #3013, #2530 spelling, typo _GLOBALS should be GLOBALS and cleanup display when users/extension conflicts occur *2.5.0.1* #2973 enable javascript to enable/disable voicemail and vmx fields when creating extension *2.5.0* #2754, #2903, #2785, #2647, #2593 Added VmX config, added O extension config, better javascript interactions *2.4.0.1* added depends on 2.4.0 *2.4.0* #2457 vm dial code to vmexten in sip_general_additional.conf, make hooks abort if extension confilct, misc fixes *2.0.3.4* Fix some labeling and make localization friendly *2.0.3.3* #2232 call to VoiceMailMain() need ${AMPUSER} was fixed wrong *2.0.3.2* CHANGELOG TRUNCATED See SVN Repository
module.description: This module allows you to configure Voicemail for a user or extension
